channel.title: i see no noscript icon in the tor browser
channel.description:
i have installed Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.ova and have updated. in the workstation i see no noscript icon in the tor browser. no matter what security level setting. if i click the right mouse button on a webpage and select noscript then nothing happens.
what is wrong and how to solve this?

item.title: i see no noscript icon in the tor browser
item.dc:creator: WhoZero
item.source: i see no noscript icon in the tor browser

item.title: i see no noscript icon in the tor browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Upstream decision. Tor Project removed noscript from default browser bar. Not a change by Whonix. See:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Does_Whonix_Change_Default_Tor_Browser_Settings.3F

Read full topic
item.source: i see no noscript icon in the tor browser
